name: SPACEMAN (itch) (arya-s)
description:
SPACEMAN

A game about a poor space man stuck in space.  
Jump on your ship and catch birds to improve your score!

Controls KeyboardGamepadMove ArrowsAnalog , D-pad Jump Space A, Cross, B ResetRSelectFullscreenAlt + FN/A Changelog

Postjam fix v 1.0.1 -  - Fix a performance issue when resetting levels by making the dust particles global
